text.name: info1
text.text: Also called the Tandy Color Computer (or just CoCo) was a home computer, released in 1980. Despite its name, the TRS-80 Color Computer represented a major departure from previous TRS-80 models, in particular because it employed the Motorola MC6809E microprocessor at the time. instead of the Zilog Z-80, used on the TRS-80 models.
